url: pfsrd://NPC Codex/Rules/Core Class NPCs/Fighter/Fighters/Traitorous Brigand/Rorn the Black

sections.body: Rorn has made a good living as a bandit, but the same can't be said for his allies. Sometimes he runs out on them when their luck turns bad, sometimes he's the only survivor, and sometimes he cuts down his own allies to claim all the loot.

name: Rorn the Black
